oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mr. and Mrs. Paul Edwin Dozier wedding reception, 1941 April 10
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mr. and Mrs. Paul Edwin Dozier are pictured at the reception at the Woman’s Club, Thursday evening, which followed their wedding at the First Church of the Nazarene. Mrs. Dozier is the former Miss Loraze Duncan, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. A. P. Duncan. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Dozier, Paul E.; Duncan, Loraze
